features: Dual Wireless Microphones for iPhone: This dual wireless lavalier microphone set built-in noise reduction chip, real-time auto-sync technology, and 2.4G signal transmission with super low latency(0.009s), the sound picking-up follows the picture in real-time. Lapel microphone wireless can easily cope with various noisy environments and truly restore human voices.

Plug AND Play: No Bluetooth, No APP needed! Just plug the Lightning connector into the Phone, and clip the mini microphone onto the shirt, and it starts working in One Second. 2 packs of lav mic allow two people to get involved in a video recording together, providing efficiency and convenience for a team worker. Suit for Vlog, Interview, Live streaming, YouTube, TikTok, Podcast, Instagram, Online video tutorial, and Singing recording, etc.

36H Working Time & Sharp Audio at Distance: Wireless microphones Built-in 600mAh rechargeable battery works up to 12 hours on a single 1-hour charge. A powerful wireless 100ft transmission keeps audio stable, even at long distances. With a USB Type-C/Lightning interface on each unit, we can charge iPhone while recording. No more low battery panic.

Lightweight & Clip-on Microphone: The professional lavalier microphone kit has 1 receiver and 2 transmitters included, which makes it possible to record sound or video from both 2 parties at the same time. Each wireless microphone with a little but strong clip, which is easy to clip the mic on your clothes. Only 0.23oz makes it feel like you're not wearing a lapel microphone at all. (We can also use one mic and receiver set)

Designed for iPhone/iPad video recording: The wireless microphones can work with iPhone 6/ 6 Plus, iPhone 7/ 7 Plus, 8/8 Plus, X/XR/XS/XS Max, 11/11 Pro/11 Pro Max, 12/12 Pro/12 Pro Max, 13/13 Pro/13 Pro Max, iPad 2nd/3rd/4th gen, iPad Air series(Except the 4th gen), iPad Mini(Except the 6th gen), iPad Pro series (Except the 1st/2nd/3rd gen 11in. The 3rd/4th/5th gen 12.9in) 【Not support those iPads with type-c port】

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Professional Wireless Lavalier Lapel Microphone for iPhone, iPad If you're a content creator, vlogger, or someone who often records audio or video, you know how important it is to have high-quality audio. The built-in microphones on most devices don't cut it. They often capture unwanted noise and don't pick up your voice clearly, making your content sound unprofessional. But don't worry, we have a solution for you. This Wireless Lavalier Lapel Microphone is a game-changer.

High-Quality Sound Pickup The wireless microphone features high-sensitive sound pickup mic components, which help the microphone capture your voice with a high sample rate and restores your voice without any distortion. This means your voice will sound clear and crisp, even in noisy environments. Stable and Low-Latency Transmission The wireless lavalier microphone uses an advanced chipset that transmits in the 2.4 GHz frequency range, enabling interference-free, stable, and low-latency wireless transmission up to 100ft. You can move around freely during your live broadcasts without worrying about tangled wires or limited range.

Easy to Use The microphone is designed to be user-friendly, with a simple plug and play setup. First, plug the receiver into your device's lightning port. Then power on the microphones and connect them to the receiver. That's it, you're ready to record! No More Messy Cables The wireless lapel lavalier microphones can be clipped on the collar to free your hands for audio and video recording. This means you won't have to deal with messy cables that restrict your movement or get in the way.

Slide down the button resume the work, Slide up the button to pause the work. The wireless lavalier lapel microphone has three different modes: regular mode, reverb mode, and noise reduction mode. Regular mode: Take out the microphone from the charging case or Press and hold the power button for 3 seconds until the blue light turns on. The microphone is now in regular mode. Reverb mode: Press the power button twice quickly. The white light will flash, indicating that the microphone is in reverb mode. Press the power button twice again to exit reverb mode. Noise reduction mode: Press the power button once. The blue light will flash, indicating that the microphone is in noise reduction mode. Press the power button again to exit noise reduction mode.
Package includes： 2 x Wireless Microphone 1 x Charging case 1 x IOS Receiver 1 x Type C Charging Cable 1 x User Manual 1 x Exquisite gift box

If you're looking to upgrade your audio and video recording setup, this Professional Wireless Lavalier Lapel Microphone is an excellent option.It's easy to use, provides high-quality sound pickup, has stable and low-latency transmission, and comes with superior noise reduction capabilities.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 15, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I must say, this wireless microphone exceeded my expectations in every aspect. This compact and affordable microphone proved to be a game-changer for my audio recording needs.The first thing that struck me about the microphone was its build quality. Despite its compact size, it felt sturdy and well-constructed, giving me confidence in its durability. The clip-on design of the lavalier microphone made it incredibly convenient to use, allowing me to easily attach it to my clothing without any hassle.Setting up the microphone was a breeze. The wireless connectivity worked flawlessly, and I was impressed by the microphone's strong and stable signal throughout my recording sessions. It seamlessly paired with my iPhone and iPad without any connectivity issues. This convenience allowed me to move around freely while recording, ensuring that I captured clear audio from a comfortable distance.When it came to audio quality, the microphone truly shone. The sound reproduction was exceptional, capturing crisp and clear vocals with excellent detail. It significantly improved the audio quality of my recordings compared to the built-in microphone of my iPhone and iPad. Whether I was recording interviews, podcasts, or videos, the microphone delivered professional-grade sound that impressed both myself and my audience.Overall, I highly recommend this wireless microphone to anyone in need of a high-quality, versatile, and affordable wireless microphone. It offers excellent build quality, easy setup, outstanding audio performance, and great battery life. Whether you're a content creator, journalist, podcaster, or simply someone who wants to improve their audio recording capabilities, this microphone is a fantastic choice that won't disappoint.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewText: These mics work perfectly fine. It was more than what I was expecting. If you are content creator or looking to get started, then you want to get this. It’s very efficient and you can hear sound from a far distance.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Super easy set up, really nice magnetic charging case, great price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 4, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Little Microphone for the Price
reviews.reviewText: These microphones are great. They are very simple to use and set up. The carrying case they come in is perfect for transporting them around. I tested the range and it was still picking up my voice from pretty far away. I was impressed. The sound quality is pretty good for the price, but can't compete with the more expensive microphones. We got these so that our daughter could interview her grandparents and they worked perfectly. If you need to hide the microphone, it's kind of tough but not impossible, as they are a bit on the larger size. Overall, I would definitely recommend these for the price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Nicer than I thought they would be
reviews.reviewText: Plug and play. Sounds good and seems like good quality

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars It's so easy to use!
reviews.reviewText: I love using new tech, but sometimes I really hate learning how it works. I didn't even need to read the directions to get this microphone working. I opened up the box and the pieces were intuitive. All you need to do is plug the lightning connector to your phone or iPad and then turn on the microphone by flipping a switch. I had it working in 30 seconds. Other microphones require more work. I have another brand that was purchased by my employer and it's awful!This microphone also has some nice features: The lightning connector has a place where you can plug in a lightning cable if you need to charge your phone or iPad. The charging cable that comes with the set can charge the case and a microphone at the same time. There are two microphones!I'm a middle school teacher, and I often made videos for students about science content to help them if they are absent. This microphone is perfect for my needs. It will also work well for Zoom meetings. I made a few videos using it and the sound quality is great. I really couldn't be happier.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Awesome Pro Lapel Mics at an Amazing Price!
reviews.reviewText: PASABIT has created an incredibly great recording tool that it's selling at a rather incredible price.The mic has great sound pickup at a high sample rate and its on-board processing delivers an exceptional-quality signal suitable for pro recording. It's wireless, of course, but with an exceptional range that allows you to roam as much as 100 feet from the receiver, which makes it great not only for studio recordings but also work in the field.Setup is quick and easy – simply plug the receiver into the lightning port on your iPhone or iPad, turn on the mic and link it to the receiver and you're ready to go.The carrying case also serves as a charging station; it plugs into any USB connector and can easily bring you back to full charge in a surprisingly short time.Whether you're a podcaster, chatting with friends in live streams or a gamer, this is a great solution. And, even better, it includes not one, but two mics – perfect for those in-the-field interviews!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars 6 Month Review - Disappointed.
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. I purchased this microphone after reading the reviews. This product is very easy to use out of the box. It connected to my phone quickly and the audio on this unit is very good. For the most part it picked up sound even when my head was turned away from the microphone. For his reason I really liked the product and normally would recommend it. Recently, I started to notice some problems (about 6 months after purchase). Intermittently, the microphone would stop connecting. I shot a few of my YouTube video segments not having sound and had to re-shoot them - Very frustrating! The piece that fits into the phone would have trouble connecting to the microphone and not transmitting to the phone. I would wiggle the piece that goes into the phone and the connection would intermittently go on & off. This was indicated by the little blue light on the phone connection turning on and off. Now, it will not connect at all with the microphone. I was pleased with how this microphone worked for the price, but the durability and longevity of it was very disappointing.
